bulkUpdateDialog.title: Confirm Global AI Update
bulkUpdateDialog.description: This action will update all profiles. The process will run in the background. Do you want to continue?

searchBar.tipContent: Use keywords like name, city, or occupation for more precise results.

activeFilters.title: Active Filters

toasts.uploadError: One or more images failed to upload

header.title: Edit Profile - {{firstName}} {{lastName}}
header.description: Edit the candidate's details and preferences in the system

inviteDialog.title: Invite Candidate to Manage Account
inviteDialog.description: Send an invitation to {{fullName}} to set a password and take control of the profile.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Candidate Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the candidate {{fullName}}?
deleteDialog.irreversible: This action is irreversible and will remove all candidate data from the system.
deleteDialog.mismatchError: The entered text does not match.

invite.title: Send Invitation to Candidate
invite.description: Send a personal invitation to join the system
invite.successDescription: The candidate will receive an email notification
whatsNextItems: The candidate will receive a personal email invitation
They can register and complete their details
You will be notified when the candidate joins

availability.title: Check Availability
availability.description: Check the candidate's availability for a meeting
availability.successDescription: The candidate will be notified and can update their availability
whatsNextItems: Sending a notification to the candidate
A request to update their schedule
availability.messageContent: "Hello {{firstName}}, the matchmaker wishes to check your availability for a meeting. Please update your schedule in the system."

suggest.title: New Match Suggestion
suggest.whatsNextDescription: Click 'Continue' to open the full suggestion creation form with all the necessary options and details.

addManualCandidateDialog.title: Add Candidate Manually
addManualCandidateDialog.description: Enter the details of the candidate you want to add manually to the system.

email.label: Email Address (Optional)
email.description: If no email is provided, an internal system address will be created.

sendInvite.label: Send an invitation to the candidate to set up an account after adding
sendInvite.disabledTooltip: An email address is required to send an invitation

birthDate.ageDescription: An approximate birth date (Jan 1st of the birth year) will be entered based on the age provided.

notes.label: Free Text about the Candidate
notes.placeholder: Describe the candidate, background, traits, what they are looking for, etc...

photos.label: Photos (up to {{max}})
photos.cta: Drag & drop photos here, or click to select
photos.description: PNG, JPG, WEBP (up to {{maxSize}}MB per image)

error.missingFields: Please fill all required fields: first name, last name, gender, and free text.
error.invalidAge: Please enter a valid age (between 1 and 120).

success.inviteSent: Candidate added and invitation sent successfully!
success.inviteError: Candidate added, but sending the invitation failed: {{error}}

deleteDialog.description: This action will permanently delete the suggestion and it cannot be recovered.

infoAlert.body: This message will be sent in the context of the active match suggestion.

form.signatureNotice: The system will automatically add a professional signature

footer.notificationNotice: Recipients will be notified via email and WhatsApp

successRate.title: Success Rate

successRate.noData: Not enough data to calculate success rate

currentActivity.title: Current Activity

heroSection.title: Welcome to the Matchmaker System
heroSection.subtitle: Manage all matchmaking suggestions, track couples' progress, and create perfect matches.

PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.label: Pending Party A
PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.description: Suggestion sent to the first party, awaiting response.

PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.label: Pending Party B
PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.description: Party A approved, suggestion sent to the second party.

FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.label: Party A Approved
FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.description: The first party has approved the suggestion.

SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.label: Party B Approved
SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.description: Both parties have approved the suggestion.

FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.label: Party A Declined
FIRST_PARTY_DECLINED.description: The first party has declined the suggestion.

SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.label: Party B Declined
SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.description: The second party has declined the suggestion.

CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.label: Contact Details Shared
CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.description: Contact details have been shared between both parties.

ENGAGED.label: Engaged
ENGAGED.description: The couple is engaged - a great success!

MARRIED.label: Married
MARRIED.description: The couple got married - a perfect match!

AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.label: Awaiting Date Feedback
AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.description: The first date occurred, awaiting feedback.

EXPIRED.label: Expired
EXPIRED.description: Response time has passed without an answer.

DEFAULT.label: In Progress
DEFAULT.description: The suggestion is being handled by the matchmaker.

toasts.selectParties: Please select both parties for the suggestion.

errorState.description: Essential data for calculating the match is missing.
errorState.suggestion: Please ensure both candidates have a full profile with birth date, city of residence, and religious level.

perfect.description: An ideal pair with exceptional compatibility!

excellent.description: A pair with high potential for success.

good.description: A quality match with good chances.

low.description: Limited compatibility, should be considered carefully.

rationale.placeholder: General rationale explaining why there's a match...

notes.description: Personal text highlighting the benefits of the other party for them.

internalNotes.description: Notes and instructions for matchmaker team use only.

deadline.title: Decision Deadline
deadline.description: Set the final date for the parties to respond.
deadline.label: Select a response period

infoBox.title: Important Information
infoBox.body: After the selected time period, if no response is received from one of the parties, the suggestion will automatically be moved to 'Expired' status.

summary.title: Suggestion Summary
summary.description: All details are ready to create the suggestion.
summary.info: After creating the suggestion, it will be automatically sent to the first party.

aiLoading.title: The AI is drafting the rationale package...
aiLoading.description: This may take a few seconds.

aiSuccess.title: Rationale generated successfully!
aiSuccess.description: All fields have been automatically filled with personalized content.

aiError.title: Error generating rationale
aiError.description: Please try again or fill the fields manually.

statusChange.title: Change Status
statusChange.description: Update suggestion status based on progress.
